summary:
I am well experienced iOS and tvOS developer with over 9 years of commercial experience in this field.
Specialties: iOS/tvOS and Internet Application Development.
I am passionate about automation and intelligent buildings. In my free time I create some IoT stuff to remotely manage my home. C++, basics of electronics etc.
Commercial pilot having some experience in flight data analytics.
I also created several internet applications based on PHP interpreter and other complementary technologies (especially JavaScrpt/AJAX. xHTML/HTML, CSS etc.) Last time my work is connected with VASP development.

Mobica Ltd.
oddział w Polsce sp. z o.o.
professionalExperience.summary: Working as contractor, body leasy formula for several clients all over the World. ;-)

professionalExperience.companyName: Color Media Group sp. z o.o.
professionalExperience.summary: Development of framework used to display ads within tvOS applications. Technologies: Objective-c, C, Swift, REST Api, AVFramework etc.

Responsibility: providing high level strategy and architecture guidance across the portfolio of enterprise applications and capabilities, writing architectural documentation, serving as primary interface to US based architecture and project management teams.

professionalExperience.position: senior iOS developer and team lead
professionalExperience.summary: As senior iOS developer and team lead I was responsible for development of application which is a part of larger system whose primary goal is to replace paper forms used in practices and hospitals throughout US with electronic registration system based on tablets (iPads). My responsibility was not only to develop source code but also to verify work of younger employees, merge their code into master branch of repository, maintaining documentation and establishing company standards for data exchange between mobile application and server.

The most important project available to public was tvp.pl which provides TVP content for mobile devices. I coordinated a team of developers who created the platform i.e. server side scripts and Android app and made an iOS app solely. Another projects include in-house distribution of Lilly's insulin presentation, objective-c engine and HTML content with CSS 3 and jQuery animations

professionalExperience.position: Internet services developer, international team coordinator
professionalExperience.summary: Server side applications for value added services in mobile networks, premium SMS, IVR, etc. The services I created at that time were targeted at large companies mostly TVP S.A. and Eurozet sp. z o.o.
